name: BOSTON MEDICAL CENTER
description: Academic Medical Center and Safety Net Hospital
sampleDescriptions:
H.R. 6 - Support for Patients and Communities Act of 2018- issues related to prevention, care and treatment of individuals and families struggling with opioid and substance use disorders. 

S. 3120 - Helping to End Addiction and LEssen Substance Use Disorders Act of 2018 - issues related to prevention,care and treatment of individuals and families struggling with opioid and substance use disorders. 

H.R. 4392 - Support for legislation to restore 340b reimbursements to safety net hospitals. Work to support efforts to stop CMS OPPS rule's provision to cut funding for the 340B program. 

CMS OPPS rule as it relates to the restructuring 340(b) reimbursements to safety net hospitals.
Development of ACOs and other delivery system structures piloted by the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation. 

Regulations and policies impacting federal policies regarding Medicaid and 1332 waivers. 

Legislative and regulatory efforts impacting teh private individual and small group marketplaces.

Development of ACOs and other delivery system structures piloted by the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation. 

Regulations and policies impacting federal policies regarding Medicaid and 1332 waivers. 

Work to maintain the standing "site neutral" policy in the Medicare program.

Issues related to curbing opioid abuse and substance use disorder including use of MAT, counseling, 42 CFR Part 2 and other approaches to support individuals and their families.

Issues related to expanding the GME program to allow for additional slots to train physicians in the fight against addiction. 

Policies related to social determinants of health (SDH) with a focus on food as medicine, the importance of stable housing and the need for caregiving supports to help patients to get well and stay well. 

Support for legislation to stabilize and improve the health insurance marketplace. 

Support for the reauthorization of a strong, stable Medicaid DSH program.

Support for a strong, stable 340(b) program.
